mapper.select: SELECT noti_no, noti_type, mem_no, noti_msg, TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM SYSDATE - create_date), 'FM00') || '시간 ' || TO_CHAR(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM SYSDATE - create_date), 'FM00') || '분 전' AS create_date ,is_read FROM tb_notification WHERE mem_no = #{memNo} AND TRUNC(create_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY create_date asc
